New Records: Cleveland Cavaliers won 13 in a row for the fourth time in franchise history
That Warriors team holds the record for most wins to begin a campaign at 24 straight
Key Match Events: Mitchell hit three 3-pointers with less than three minutes to play to extend Cleveland's lead to seven
Cleveland became the first team since the 2015-16 Golden State Warriors to win 13 straight to begin a season
Post-Match Reflections: The best news of the day for the Sixers came pre-game when both George and Embiid were cleared to play on Friday night in Orlando

Miscellaneous Highlights: Donovan Mitchell scored 23 points, grabbed 13 rebounds and added nine assists
Darius Garland scored 25 points while Evan Mobley had 14 points with seven rebounds
Jared McCain had a career-high 34 for the 76ers
Kelly Oubre Jr. had 20 points while Caleb Martin added 18 for the Sixers
